messages.subject: Cross posting: Anyone in Chicago?
messages.msgSnippet: DH will be in Chicago from Jan 25 to Feb 5. He’s flying, it’s for business, and he’ll have a hotel room all to himself. I’m considering driving up
messages.messageBody:
DH will be in Chicago from Jan 25 to Feb 5. He�s flying, it�s for business,
and he�ll have a hotel room all to himself. I�m considering driving up there

we�ve never been there, there�s a lot to see, and the hotel room is paid

I�d love to meet with some unschoolers and find out the best places to

Silvia
